4. Welcome to bizarro’s documentation!¶

4.1. Buttons Template¶

Write stuff here

4.1.1. Documentation¶

class bizarro.template.template_button.ButtonTemplate(facebook_user_id)¶

ButtonTemplate class

button_template(title_text: str, buttons: list, sharable: bool = False)¶

Creates a template format for button template

Reference: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/messenger-platform/reference/template/button/

Parameters

  • title_text (string) – UTF-8-encoded text of up to 640 characters. Text will appear above the buttons.

  • buttons (list) – Set of 1-3 buttons that appear as call-to-actions.

  • sharable (bool) – Optional. Set to true to enable the native share button in Messenger for the template message. Defaults to false.

Returns

Button_Template in the form of a dictionary

4.1.2. Code Example¶
